org.gservlet

Class AbstractFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gservlet.AbstractFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter

    public abstract class AbstractFilter
extends Object
implements Filter
    Abstract class to perform filtering tasks on either the request to a resource, or on the response from a resource, or both
    Author:
    Mamadou Lamine Ba

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      void doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
      Invokes the filter method defined on the subclasses
      void filter()
      A convenience method which can be overridden so that there's no need to implement the doFilter(request, response, chain) method

      Returns the FilterChain object

      Returns the Sql object

      A convenience method which can be overridden so that there's no need to call super.init(config) The FilterConfig object can still be retrieved via getConfig().

      • init

        public void init()
          throws ServletException
        A convenience method which can be overridden so that there's no need to call super.init(config) The FilterConfig object can still be retrieved via getConfig().
        Throws:
        ServletException - the ServletException
